title: Battle Over Deep-Sea Mining Takes on New Urgency as Trial Run Winds Down
description: A Canadian company is testing mining equipment in the Pacific Ocean in its quest for metals needed for electric vehicles. Environmentalists oppose the mining, which could begin in 2024.
dc:creator: Eric Lipton
media:credit: Charles M. Vella/SOPA Images, via LightRocket â€” Getty Images
media:description: Protesters in Rotterdam projected statements onto the Hidden Gem, a ship used by the Metals Company.
